content: स्कंद् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (स्कंदते) {@--1@} To jump. {@--2@} To raise. {@--3@} To pour out, emit.

स्कंद् {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (स्कंदति, स्कन्न) {@--1@} To leap, jump. {@--2@} To rise, ascend, jump upwards. {@--3@} To fall, drop; <ls>Bk. 22. 11.</ls> {@--4@} To burst or leap out. {@--5@} To perish, come to an end; चस्कंदे तप ऐश्वरम्. {@--6@} To be spilled, ooze. {@--7@} To emit, shed. {@--8@} To go, move. {@--9@} To become dry. {@--10@} To perish. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (स्कंदयति-ते) {@--1@} To pour out, effuse, shed, emit (as the seminal fluid); एकः शयीत सर्वत्र न रेतः स्कंदयेत् क्वचित् <ls>Ms. 2. 180</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">9. 50.</ls> {@--2@} To omit, neglect, pass by. {vII.v} {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (स्कंदयति-ते) To collect.
